entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 12:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 3.5°C
Wind: NNE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers changing to rain near noon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to a few flurries this evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
